primary

Class Odometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • primary.Odometer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Thread
    Odometer class, takes value from the tachometer and gives a somewhat precise estimation of the current position. The Odometer works closely with the Odometer Correction class in order to achieve more precise results
    Author:
    Erik-Olivier Riendeau, 2016
